document.full_text: the top u.s. securities regulator pledged a rigorous review of potentially outdated private securities trading rules, but stopped short of endorsing changes being advocated by republican lawmakers.
document.title: sec chief keeps options open on private securities
lines_and_colors: the top u.s. securities regulator pledged a rigorous review of potentially outdated private securities trading rules, but stopped short of endorsing changes being advocated by republican lawmakers.
